visual.title: More Rockets
visual.desc: Doubles the number of summoned rockets

visual.title: Giant’s Strength
visual.desc: Increases health, damage, and fire rate; increases size

visual.title: Enchanted Weapon
visual.desc: Weapon detaches and shoots automatically; reduces attack speed

visual.title: Wind’s Blessing
visual.desc: Increases movement speed, reduces size, and grants dodge chance

visual.title: Resurrection
visual.desc: Revives the hero once per level

visual.title: Meteor
visual.desc: Chance to summon a meteor when attacking

visual.title: Wounded Warrior
visual.desc: When damaged, attack power increases by 50% for 5 seconds

visual.title: Sniper
visual.desc: The farther the target, the higher the damage

visual.title: Healing
visual.desc: Gradually regenerates health when HP is below 30%

visual.title: Vampire
visual.desc: Chance to restore health when killing zombies

visual.title: Radioactive Aura
visual.desc: Deals damage to nearby enemies and weakens them

visual.title: Circular Web
visual.desc: Summoned orbs link into a damaging web

visual.title: Zombie Slayer
visual.desc: Temporarily increases attack after a kill

visual.title: Warrior’s Heart
visual.desc: Picking up hearts may increase attack power

visual.title: Quick Shot
visual.desc: Increases fire rate but reduces damage

visual.title: Lucky Heart
visual.desc: Picking up hearts may increase max HP
